casebody.data:
Joseph T. WALSH
v.
TOWN OF WRIGHTSVILLE BEACH BOARD OF ALDERMAN ACTING As A Board of Adjustment, Charles W. Smith, III, and wife, Constance C. Smith. No. 467P06-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 24, 2008. J. Wesley Casteen, Clinton, for Walsh. Michael C. Murchison, Wilmington, for Charles & Constance Smith. John C. Wessell, III, Wilmington, for Town of Wrightsville Beach.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 11th day of December 2007 by Petitioner in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th day of January 2008."
